GET /api.description: Returns this endpoints document describing all available routes, params, and bodies.

GET /api/users.description: Returns all users (id, display_name, pin, session_count, session_limit, created_at).

GET /api/users/:id.description: Returns a single user by id.

GET /api/users/:id/sessions.description: Returns all sessions for a user id.

GET /api/users/:userId/sessions/live.description: Returns the current live session for a user id (404 if none).

GET /api/users/:userId/sessions/live/req.description: Returns all requests for the user's live session; 404 if no live session or no requests.

GET /api/sessions/:id/requests.description: Returns all requests for a session id; 404 if session missing or has no requests.

GET /api/sessions/:id/comments.description: Returns all comments attached to requests in a session id; 404 if none.

GET /api/requests/:requestId/comments.description: Returns all comments for a request id; 404 if none.

POST /api/sessions/:sessionId/requests.description: Creates a new request for a session id.

POST /api/requests/:requestId/comments.description: Creates a new comment for a request id.

PATCH /api/requests/:requestId/status.description: Updates the status and optional approve/reject reason for a request id.

PATCH /api/requests/:requestId/votes.description: Increments or decrements votes for a request id by the provided delta.

PATCH /api/comments/:commentId/pinned.description: Sets the pinned boolean for a comment id.

DELETE /api/sessions/:sessionId.description: Deletes a session id and cascades to its requests and comments.

DELETE /api/requests/:requestId.description: Deletes a request id and its comments.

DELETE /api/sessions/:sessionId/requests.description: Deletes all requests (and related comments) for a session id.
